title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Advanced Foreign Language Education Using LLMs: Personalized Learning and Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will be able to establish and implement personalized foreign language learning plans using LLM-based tools
Learners will be able to correct over 80% of writing and speaking errors using real-time feedback features of LLMs
Learners can present at least three criteria for evaluating the credibility of LLM-generated content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
